data.text: @yorgnaoh @nytimes @BillHanage @DrSullivanATL @apoorva_nyc Are you autistic by any chance?

@JamesDRichard3 @yorgnaoh @nytimes @BillHanage @DrSullivanATL @apoorva_nyc The Spanish variant got tired after a few years, and 50 million deaths. Smallpox never got tired. Neither did polio. Oh, and measles.
@nytimes @BillHanage @DrSullivanATL @apoorva_nyc Mariupol. Maternity hospital.  CLOSE UKRAINIAN SKY https://t.co/0WPjf9t1Hk
@nytimes @BillHanage @DrSullivanATL @apoorva_nyc Act like adults might be a good start. We have 100x of different things that can kill you deal with it.

@JamesDRichard3 @Indaliks @nytimes @BillHanage @DrSullivanATL @apoorva_nyc So you're saying because everyone eventually dies? What a bonehead thing to say! Perhaps, we should stop giving out vaccines, medications including insulin. Ain't you a breath of fetid air from a festering pile of 💩 in August.

Get off my Twitter page!

@SassyODaisy @Indaliks @nytimes @BillHanage @DrSullivanATL @apoorva_nyc Glad I don't live in Japan. I never got covid until I was already vaxed. I made it over a year un vaxed and working in a hospital so I don't think it was all that contagious and deadly. You stay scared though. You seem to like living like that.

@ZamojskiJan @EsaHamalainen1 @nytimes @BillHanage @DrSullivanATL @apoorva_nyc I'm saying that masks are for more show at this point.  Just spent a couple days travelling and watching most of the people in the airport with masks being worn incorrectly, and nobody bothering to enforce it.

@SassyODaisy @Indaliks @nytimes @BillHanage @DrSullivanATL @apoorva_nyc How many of those people would have died anyway from old age or other co morbidities. You can't stop death. It's coming for us all. You can die from the vax. Don't be brainwashed by your government. https://t.co/Jcdm6zXvC9

@JamesDRichard3 @Indaliks @nytimes @BillHanage @DrSullivanATL @apoorva_nyc So you're okay with 6 million people dying from Covid-19 bc there's 7 BILLION people on Earth?

I am not okay with that bc the death of a loved one is so heartbreaking and devastating. Not a day goes by when I don't think about my aunt & how she never got to meet my son.😢 💔
